mapper.insert: insert into tbl_msg(title, content, fromnick, tonick) values(#{title},#{content},#{fromnick},#{tonick})
mapper.select: select msgno, title, fromnick, regdate from tbl_msg where tonick = #{tonick} and msgno > 0 order by msgno desc
select msgno, title, tonick, regdate from tbl_msg where fromnick = #{fromnick} and msgno > 0 order by msgno desc
select title, content, regdate, fromnick, tonick from tbl_msg where msgno = #{msgno}
